channel.title: Happy Wars
channel.description: Just wondering if anyone else plays this game. For those of you who don't know about it, its a free (yes, FREE) XBox Live Arcade game that is multiplayer with up to 30 people and is actually pretty fun. I've managed to go ~6 hours straight with a few friends playing this. Definitely try it out, theres more info at http://playxbla.com/ee/happy-wars

item.title: Happy Wars
item.dc:creator: @Vexx Vexx
item.description:
@Vexx wrote:

I was able to play the beta, it was not very fun.

Read full topic
